price: A он се њиховим киповима прикраде, па их упита: „Зашто не једете?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
